overview.title: The Most Anticipated Event of the Year
overview.subtitle: A transformative experience that illuminates the path of yoga
overview.description: The Faro de Luz Festival is ACIKY's most important annual celebration, where the Kundalini Yoga community gathers to experience deep and collective transformation. During this special event, participants from all over Cuba and beyond connect in a unique experience that combines ancestral teachings, intensive practices, sacred music, and the collective energy that only a festival of this magnitude can offer.
